content.html: I’m seeing a lot of self care tweets about forgiving yourself, which is nice. But for my tech friends*, if you’re doing harmful shit, you have to STOP DOING IT before forgiving yourselves. *this applies to other people but I feel most comfortable fussing at tech folks
content.value:
I’m seeing a lot of self care tweets about forgiving yourself, which is nice. 

But for my tech friends*, if you’re doing harmful shit, you have to STOP DOING IT before forgiving yourselves.

*this applies to other people but I feel most comfortable fussing at tech folks
